dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from NETeller.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Valerie Strike [mailto:Valerie.S@NETeller.com] 
Posted At: Monday, May 01, 2006 4:03 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NETeller.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NETeller.com


Thank you for your email.   However we note that the trademarked word
"Neteller" still appears throughout the site at www.netellersites.com.  

To clarify, Neteller plc is the owner of registered trademark no.
2,812,884 (the word "Neteller"  - registered February 10, 2004),  for:
Electronic Payment Services, namely making payments on behalf of
consumers for goods and services purchased frmo Merchants by the
Consumer, using monies transfered electronically.
First use in commerce: 7-0-2000.
 
The undersigned, in good faith, certifies, under penalty of perjury,
that the use of the Neteller name in numerous places on this site
infringes the registered trademark rights of Neteller plc and that
Neteller plc has not authorized use of its trademark on this site and
the use of our trademark on such site is not defensible.  The owner of
this site is attempting to profit from the goodwill associated with the
Neteller trademark.
 
Accordingly, we require that all references to "Neteller" on the site be
removed.  Please contact the undersigned if you have any questions.
 

Valerie Strike
Legal Counsel North America

c/o Suite 64008,
5512 4th Street NW
Calgary, Alberta
N2K 6J0
valerie@NETeller.comToll Free: 888.258.5859 Direct Line: 769-3656
www.NETeller.com

This e-mail message is intended only for the named recipient(s) above
and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and/or
exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If you have received this
message in error, or are not the named recipient(s), please immediately
notify the sender and delete this e-mail message. 
    

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2006 3:50 PM
To: Valerie Strike; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NETeller.com

To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement

Sent: Friday, April 07, 2006 6:50 AM

To: copyright@theplanet.com

Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA notice]
